title: Please fix it if you can !
body: Riot I wanna report for a bug here ! Recently I get MANY pings while playing LoL . BUT my Skype doesn't lag at all . So Please look it up . PLEASE and if You can Please remove my bans cause i am very angry right now !

replies.body: Inconsistent high pings can be due to an unstable connection as well as packet loss.  In addition to Rineyy and Kayle's assistance, I also recommend using our [Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) which can help you find what went wrong.  Let us know if you have any questions!

Hello! Please review the [trouble shooting connection issues KB.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Also, please refrain from posting about account suspensions on the forums, but instead[ submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) instead.

Hi Kayle,

Your trouble shooting connection guide link appears to be broken, likely because you're putting a full stop at the end of it. Just a heads up. ^^

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AX9eAA8X,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-09T19:57:55.874+0000)
>
> Hi Kayle,
> 
> Your trouble shooting connection guide link appears to be broken, likely because you're putting a full stop at the end of it. Just a heads up. ^^

Gah! I typed a period in the url, when I meant for it to appear as text hehe. Thank you! ^_^
